wikipedia_page.main: Matthew Hamilton (born 2 February 1990 in Hemel Hempstead) is a British auto racing driver. He is best known for competing in the British Touring Car Championship.

response: * Matt Hamilton: FIA GT4 European Cup → TH Motorsport
* Matt Hamilton joined the series at Rockingham.
† - Matt Hamilton, James Cole and Alex Jones docked six points for dangerous driving; Glen Wood docked twelve points for the same reason.

Another Integra was acquired, formerly run by David Pinkney, that was used by George in the 2009 season.http://www.touringcartimes.com/news.php?id=3228 John George returns in 2009 At the tail end of the season a Honda Civic was entered for teenage debutant Matt Hamilton.

TH Motorsport and Matt Hamilton planned to return to the BTCC in 2012, running a NGTC Skoda Octavia VRS.http://www.btcc.net/html/generalnews_detail.php?id=2510&month=0&year=2011&form=&searchterm= However, the project was eventually cancelled.
Matt Hamilton or Matthew Hamilton may refer to:
* Matt Hamilton withdrew from the round at Croft due to financial difficulties and missed the rest of the season. However he is looking at finding the funds to return in 2011.
